publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-328 Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Answering of Parliamentary Questions—That the Parliament notes with concern that the Executive is giving holding answers to more than 40% of the written Parliamentary Questions lodged, and in the interests of openness, transparency and professionalism, recommends that the Executive gives a substantive reply to all written Parliamentary Questions within the specified 14 days.
S1M-328 Answering of Parliamentary Questions (lodged on 26 November 1999) Bill Aitken*, Tricia Marwick*, Linda Fabiani*, Roseanna Cunningham*, Dennis Canavan*, Mr Lloyd Quinan*

S1M-328 Answering of Parliamentary Questions (lodged on 26 November 1999) Mr Keith Harding*, David McLetchie*, Alex Fergusson*, Mr Nick Johnston*, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh*, Miss Annabel Goldie*, Mary Scanlon*, Mr Brian Monteith*, Alex Johnstone*, Mr Jamie McGrigor*, Michael Matheson*, Mr Duncan Hamilton*, David Mundell*, Ben Wallace*, John Young*, Phil Gallie*, Mr Kenneth Gibson*
S1M-328 Answering of Parliamentary Questions (lodged on 26 November 1999) Brian Adam*, Mr David Davidson*

S1M-328 Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Answering of Parliamentary Questions—That the Parliament notes with concern that the Executive is giving holding answers to more than 40% of the written Parliamentary Questions lodged, and in the interests of openness, transparency and professionalism, recommends that the Executive gives a substantive reply to all written Parliamentary Questions within the specified 14 days. Supported by: Bill Aitken, Tricia Marwick, Linda Fabiani, Roseanna Cunningham, Dennis Canavan, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Keith Harding, David McLetchie, Alex Fergusson, Mr Nick Johnston, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Miss Annabel Goldie, Mary Scanlon, Mr Brian Monteith, Alex Johnstone, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Michael Matheson, Mr Duncan Hamilton, David Mundell, Ben Wallace, John Young, Phil Gallie, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Brian Adam, Mr David Davidson
S1M-328 Answering of Parliamentary Questions (lodged on 26 November 1999) Christine Grahame*
S1M-328 Answering of Parliamentary Questions (lodged on 26 November 1999) Fergus Ewing*, Ms Sandra White*
S1M-328 Answering of Parliamentary Questions (lodged on 26 November 1999) Mrs Margaret Ewing*, Mr Gil Paterson*, Dorothy-Grace Elder*

S1M-328 Lord James Douglas-Hamilton: Answering of Parliamentary Questions—That the Parliament notes with concern that the Executive is giving holding answers to more than 40% of the written Parliamentary Questions lodged, and in the interests of openness, transparency and professionalism, recommends that the Executive gives a substantive reply to all written Parliamentary Questions within the specified 14 days. Supported by: Bill Aitken, Tricia Marwick, Linda Fabiani, Roseanna Cunningham, Dennis Canavan, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Keith Harding, David McLetchie, Alex Fergusson, Nick Johnston, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Miss Annabel Goldie, Mary Scanlon, Mr Brian Monteith, Alex Johnstone, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Michael Matheson, Mr Duncan Hamilton, David Mundell, Ben Wallace, John Young, Phil Gallie, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Brian Adam, Mr David Davidson, Christine Grahame, Fergus Ewing, Ms Sandra White, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Mr Gil Paterson, Dorothy-Grace Elder
S1M-328 Answering of Parliamentary Questions (lodged on 26 November 1999) Shona Robison*, Andrew Wilson*

S1M-328 Answering of Parliamentary Questions (lodged on 26 November 1999) Alex Neil*
S1M-328 Answering of Parliamentary Questions (lodged on 26 November 1999) Donald Gorrie*

Supported by: Bill Aitken, Tricia Marwick, Linda Fabiani, Roseanna Cunningham, Dennis Canavan, Mr Lloyd Quinan, Mr Keith Harding, David McLetchie, Alex Fergusson, Nick Johnston, Mrs Lyndsay McIntosh, Miss Annabel Goldie, Mary Scanlon, Mr Brian Monteith, Alex Johnstone, Mr Jamie McGrigor, Michael Matheson, Mr Duncan Hamilton, David Mundell, Ben Wallace, John Young, Phil Gallie, Mr Kenneth Gibson, Brian Adam, Mr David Davidson, Christine Grahame, Fergus Ewing, Ms Sandra White, Mrs Margaret Ewing, Mr Gil Paterson, Dorothy-Grace Elder, Shona Robison, Andrew Wilson, Tommy Sheridan, Alex Neil, Donald Gorrie
